original_text: When Pilate saw that he could prevail nothing, but that rather a tumult was made, he took water, and washed his hands before the multitude, saying, I am innocent of the blood of this just person: see ye to it.
korean_text: 빌라도가 아무 성과도 없이 도리어 민란이 나려는 것을 보고 물을 가져다가 무리 앞에서 손을 씻으며 이르되 이 사람의 피에 대하여 나는 무죄하니 너희가 당하라

sentences.original_text: When Pilate saw that he could prevail nothing
sentences.korean_translation: 빌라도가 자기가 아무것도 이룰 수 없음을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: but that rather a tumult was made
and washed his hands before the multitude
I am innocent of the blood of this just person
